casebody.data:
STOKES
v.
STOKES 82A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 15, 2018 Rebecca K. Watts, Attorney at Law, for Stokes, Bree Rushing. Kristen Shearin, Attorney at Law, Brione B. Pattison, Attorney at Law, for Stokes, William Corey (II).

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Reply Brief filed on the 13th of June 2018 by Plaintiff:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 15th of June 2018."

Plaintiff shall have up to and including the 16th day of July 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
